languages.text: {n}Ульфар сжимает защитный амулет, хмуря брови.{/n} "В таких местах рыщут недобрые, вечно голодные духи — видно, они и источили разум этой юродивой. Опасно болтать с такими безумцами, помешательство весьма заразно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ульфар сжимает защитный амулет, хмуря брови.{/n} "В таких местах рыщут недобрые, вечно голодные духи — видно, они и источили разум этой юродивой. Опасно болтать с такими безумцами, помешательство весьма заразно".

languages.text: {n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар сжимает защитный амулет, хмуря брови.{/n} "В таких местах рыщут недобрые, вечно голодные духи — видно, они и источили разум этой юродивой. Опасно болтать с такими безумцами, помешательство весьма заразно".

{n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar agarra con firmeza su amuleto protector con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «Lugares como este están llenos de espíritus malévolos y siempre hambrientos. Fueron ellos quienes royeron la mente de la loca. La locura es una plaga contagiosa, no conviene hablar con ella».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar agarra con firmeza su amuleto protector con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «Lugares como este están llenos de espíritus malévolos y siempre hambrientos. Fueron ellos quienes royeron la mente de la loca. La locura es una plaga contagiosa, no conviene hablar con ella».

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは眉をひそめ、護符を握りしめている。{/n}「悪意ある、常に飢えた魂がこのような場所を徘徊している。狂女の心を蝕んだのは彼らだった。ああいった者に話しかけるのは危険だ。狂気は伝染する災いだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは眉をひそめ、護符を握りしめている。{/n}「悪意ある、常に飢えた魂がこのような場所を徘徊している。狂女の心を蝕んだのは彼らだった。ああいった者に話しかけるのは危険だ。狂気は伝染する災いだからな」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法握紧了护身符，眉头紧锁。{/n}“那些恶毒的灵魂在这里徘徊。它们的饥渴永无止境，是它们蚕食了这个疯女人的思维。与像她这样的人交谈是件危险的事情，因为疯狂这种祸患是会传染的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法握紧了护身符，眉头紧锁。{/n}“那些恶毒的灵魂在这里徘徊。它们的饥渴永无止境，是它们蚕食了这个疯女人的思维。与像她这样的人交谈是件危险的事情，因为疯狂这种祸患是会传染的。”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar greift nach seinem Schutzamulett und runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "An Orten wie diesen lauern bösartige, stets hungrige Geister. Sie waren es, die den Verstand der Verrückten zerfraßen. Es ist gefährlich, mit Leuten wie ihr zu sprechen ... Wahnsinn ist eine ansteckende Geißel."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar greift nach seinem Schutzamulett und runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "An Orten wie diesen lauern bösartige, stets hungrige Geister. Sie waren es, die den Verstand der Verrückten zerfraßen. Es ist gefährlich, mit Leuten wie ihr zu sprechen ... Wahnsinn ist eine ansteckende Geißel."

languages.text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, Ulfar serre son amulette protectrice dans sa main.{/n} « Ce genre d'endroit est le terrain de chasse préféré des esprits insatiables et malveillants. Ce sont eux qui ont poussé cette pauvresse dans les affres de la folie. Or, la démence étant un fléau contagieux, il est dangereux de parler aux illuminés de son acabit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les sourcils froncés, Ulfar serre son amulette protectrice dans sa main.{/n} « Ce genre d'endroit est le terrain de chasse préféré des esprits insatiables et malveillants. Ce sont eux qui ont poussé cette pauvresse dans les affres de la folie. Or, la démence étant un fléau contagieux, il est dangereux de parler aux illuminés de son acabit. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, koruyucu uğurluğunu kavrayarak kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Doymak nedir bilmeyen menfur ruhlar, böylesi yerlerde sinsice gezerler. İşte bu ruhlar ki deli kadının aklını yiyip bitirmişler. Onun gibi insanlarla konuşmak tehlikelidir. Delilik, bulaşıcı bir illettir."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar clutches his protective amulet, his brow furrowing.{/n} "Malevolent, ever-hungry spirits prowl in places such as this. It was they who gnawed the madwoman's mind thin. It is dangerous to speak to people like her — madness is a contagious bane."
